title: Can't get my reward for Honor ?
body:
I Was Honnor 5 last season but i didn't get any reward (like ward's skin) and i'm asking if it's normal or a bug ? 
Thank for Helping.

replies.body: Not a bug, 2017 season rewards were handed out in November.  There were no honor rewards during the preseason, but your level would go into this new one.  [More info here](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-81-notes#patch-honor), but I hope that helps.
